entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
